thread.title: Ranveer, Sushmita, Lisa snapped at the Mumbai airport
thread.title_full: Ranveer, Sushmita, Lisa snapped at the Mumbai airport

author: Deccan
title: Ranveer, Sushmita, Lisa snapped at the Mumbai airport
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 01, 2015, 10.19 am Mumbai: The Mumbai airport was buzzing with stars. Ranveer Singh, Sushmita Sen, Lisa Haydon and Shweta Bachchan were spotted at the airport yesterday. Ranveer Singh was in Delhi to attend the launch of the first H&M India store. The actor has surprised us with his quirky looks on several occasions. This time he picked up a Mickey Mouse printed shirt with black denims, matching shoes and a bow tie. He rounded off the look with a hat and round sunglasses. On work front, the actor is gearing up for the release of Sanjay Leela Bhansali's 'Bajirao Mastani' with Priyanka Chopra and Deepika Padukone. The film is all set to release on December 18.
Sushmita Sen looked chic and glamorous.
Lisa Haydon seemed a bit surprised on spotting the paparazzi situated outside the Mumbai airport. The actress was caught off-guard, she soon hurriedly walked towards her car.
Also spotted was Amitabh Bachchan's daughter Shweta who was at her fashionable best.
(Photo: Viral Bhayani)
